<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Append task_service_offering to the Copy Related List property so that Service Offerings are included when copying a Change request</description>
        <name>Append service offering to copy change </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var svc_offering_table = 'task_service_offering';
var prop_related_list = 'com.snc.change_request.copy.related_lists';
var property = gs.getProperty(prop_related_list);
if (property) {
	var propertyArr = property.split(',');
	if (!new ArrayUtil().contains(propertyArr, svc_offering_table)) {
		propertyArr.push(svc_offering_table);
		gs.setProperty(prop_related_list, propertyArr.join(','));
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
